languages.text: "Она скрывает душу в варпе от порождений Хаоса, не отсекая связи с реальным миром. И медленно пожирает ее. День за днем душа истачивается и тлеет, пока от меня не остается лишь пустышка".

traits.locale_text: "Я помню как оно меня сначала даже заинтересовало. Вещь, которая скрывает твою душу в варпе от порождений хаоса, но не лишая способностей. Что-то, чего даже такие как я не могут добиться спустя столетия обучения и самодисциплины, доступное благодаря одному маленькому импланту".

languages.text: "It hides the soul within the warp from the spawn of Chaos without severing its connection to realspace. And it slowly consumes the soul. Day after day the soul erodes and withers until nothing remains but emptiness."
languages.original_text: "Она скрывает душу в варпе от порождений Хаоса, не отсекая связи с реальным миром. И медленно пожирает ее. День за днем душа истачивается и тлеет, пока от меня не остается лишь пустышка".

traits.locale_text: "It hides the soul within the warp from spawns of Chaos without severing its connection to realspace. And slowly consumes the soul. Day after day it erodes and withers until nothing remains but emptiness."

"It hides the soul within the warp from spawns of Chaos without severing its connection to realspace. And slowly consumes the soul. Day after day it erodes and withers until nothing remains but emptiness."

"It hides the soul within the warp from the spawn of Chaos without severing its connection to realspace. And it slowly consumes the soul. Day after day the soul erodes and withers until nothing remains but emptiness."

"It hides the soul within the warp from the spawn of Chaos without severing its connection to realspace. And it slowly consumes the soul. Day after day the soul erodes and withers until nothing remains but emptiness."

"It hides the soul within the warp from the spawn of Chaos without severing its connection to realspace. And it slowly consumes the soul. Day after day the soul erodes and withers until nothing remains but emptiness."

languages.text: “它会将佩戴者的灵魂藏在亚空间之中，不让混沌的孽种发现，而又不会切断灵魂与真实世界之间的联系。它会慢慢吞噬佩戴者的灵魂，日复一日。灵魂会被慢慢侵蚀，枯萎，直到一无所有，只剩下空洞。”
languages.original_text: "It hides the soul within the warp from the spawn of Chaos without severing its connection to realspace. And it slowly consumes the soul. Day after day the soul erodes and withers until nothing remains but emptiness."

traits.locale_text: “它会将佩戴者的灵魂藏在亚空间之中，不让混沌的孽种发现，而又不会切断灵魂与真实世界之间的联系。它会慢慢吞噬佩戴者的灵魂，日复一日。灵魂会被慢慢侵蚀，枯萎，直到一无所有，只剩下空洞。”

languages.text: «Oculta el alma de los engendros del vacío en la disformidad sin cortar su conexión con el espacio real... y consume el alma lentamente. Día a día, el alma se erosiona y marchita hasta que no contiene más que vacío».
languages.original_text: "It hides the soul within the warp from the spawn of Chaos without severing its connection to realspace. And it slowly consumes the soul. Day after day the soul erodes and withers until nothing remains but emptiness."

traits.locale_text: «Oculta el alma de los engendros del vacío en la disformidad sin cortar su conexión con el espacio real... y consume el alma lentamente. Día a día, el alma se erosiona y marchita hasta que no contiene más que vacío».

languages.text: "Es verbirgt die Seele im Warp vor der Brut des Chaos, ohne ihre Verbindung zum Realraum zu kappen. Und es verschlingt langsam die Seele. Tag für Tag wird ein Stück der Seele abgetragen und verkümmert, bis nur noch Leere übrig bleibt."
languages.original_text: "It hides the soul within the warp from the spawn of Chaos without severing its connection to realspace. And it slowly consumes the soul. Day after day the soul erodes and withers until nothing remains but emptiness."

traits.locale_text: "Es verbirgt die Seele im Warp vor der Brut des Chaos, ohne ihre Verbindung zum Realraum zu kappen. Und es verschlingt langsam die Seele. Tag für Tag wird ein Stück der Seele abgetragen und verkümmert, bis nur noch Leere übrig bleibt."

languages.text: 「リアルスペースとのつながりを断ち切ることなく、渾沌の落とし子から魂を〈歪み〉の内へと隠す。そして魂をゆっくりと蝕んでいく。日に日に魂は侵食され、枯れ果てる。あとに残るのは虚しさだけだ」
languages.original_text: "It hides the soul within the warp from the spawn of Chaos without severing its connection to realspace. And it slowly consumes the soul. Day after day the soul erodes and withers until nothing remains but emptiness."

traits.locale_text: 「リアルスペースとのつながりを断ち切ることなく、渾沌の落とし子から魂を〈歪み〉の内へと隠す。そして魂をゆっくりと蝕んでいく。日に日に魂は侵食され、枯れ果てる。あとに残るのは虚しさだけだ」

languages.text: « Il dissimule l'âme dans le Warp pour la soustraire aux rejetons du Chaos sans rompre son lien avec l'espace réel. Et il la ronge peu à peu. Jour après jour, l'âme s'érode et se flétrit jusqu'à se vider entièrement. »
languages.original_text: "It hides the soul within the warp from the spawn of Chaos without severing its connection to realspace. And it slowly consumes the soul. Day after day the soul erodes and withers until nothing remains but emptiness."

traits.locale_text: « Il dissimule l'âme dans le Warp pour la soustraire aux rejetons du Chaos sans rompre son lien avec l'espace réel. Et il la ronge peu à peu. Jour après jour, l'âme s'érode et se flétrit jusqu'à se vider entièrement. »

languages.text: "Kaos'un dölünün gerçekuzayla bağlantısına zarar vermeden öteboyutun içindeki ruhu gizliyor. Yavaş yavaş ruhu tüketiyor. Ruh, geriye boşluktan başka bir şey kalmayana dek günden güne aşınıp çürüyor."
languages.original_text: "It hides the soul within the warp from the spawn of Chaos without severing its connection to realspace. And it slowly consumes the soul. Day after day the soul erodes and withers until nothing remains but emptiness."

traits.locale_text: "Kaos'un dölünün gerçekuzayla bağlantısına zarar vermeden öteboyutun içindeki ruhu gizliyor. Yavaş yavaş ruhu tüketiyor. Ruh, geriye boşluktan başka bir şey kalmayana dek günden güne aşınıp çürüyor."
